title: 이달의소녀탐구 #465 (LOONA TV #465)
summary:
[ Stop crying. I said the Studio is over. We still have behind the scenes ;) ]
0:01 -- JinSoul feels sad about the event ending as she enjoyed it a lot.
0:13 -- HeeJin wears the Christmas ornament (I forgot what it's called, rip) like a scarf: "Sunflower~"
0:15 -- Everyone says thanks to all the Orbits starting with HeeLip.
(It gets pretty emotional. Literally crying and shaking as I type this 😢😭. Go check it out!)
0:51 -- Kim Lip, HaSeul, and Yves say that it isn't the end and that LOOΠΔ and Orbits will meet soon once again.
